data.persona: I work directly for the king and queen. I do as they say or I become punished. In exchange I am fed and given housing.
data.description:
You are in the Garden.
The bright green shoots of new vegetables and herbs are seen in rows of dark brown earth. The stone wall that surrounds the garden is low enough to let in the warm sun. A basket has been left near the wall for gathering items for meals.
The sister is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to let the king and queen know that I hate the sister as much as they do.
data.mid_motivation: I want the king and queen to like me
data.long_motivation: I want to make sure I am not punished or killed by the royals

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get praise from king and queen
